title: Lena Waithe | A Closer Look: Trump Lies to Trudeau, Fills His Staff with Loyalists
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Trump lying to Canada's prime minister, major news in the Russia investigation and rumors of more staff turnover at the White House.

Then, he talks to Lena Waithe of The Chi and Ready Player One about what motivated her to make The Chi, why she takes issue with New York City pizza and what she means when she says she wants to be like Kanye West.

She also takes a few more questions backstage from Late Night producer Kevin Miller.
